评论详情: These are excellent pajama pants for my teen, but they are very lightweight. These will not offer any protection against the chill of a cold winter night.
Super. cute and look exactly like the picture. They have pockets and real draw string.  The material is rough and isn't soft. But they are still really comfortable.

My 11 year old picked these out. They are super cute and fit well, with growing room, as she likes the loose fit. The material is a soft, light cotton. The quality is questionable as I had to trim several strings from the bottom of the pant leggs. However, she has had them for several months now and I've washed them and air dried and they are still in good condition.

Thinner & cheaper material than I expected, too short for my 12 yo, fit was weird but she said they were cute ~ and they were.  Just too many things going wrong & I didn’t trust what might happen to them in the wash.

This material is very lightweight and soft, and perfect for lounging in the summer. It's a single-sided print and extremely comfortable. I was also super excited about... POCKETS!!! But am docking a star because they are so, sooooo shallow :( Like, I'm still glad they're there vs. having none, but they're shallow enough that putting my phone in my pocket means part of it is sticking out the top, so not a secure way to walk around with it at all.
this is so tiny I got the biggest size and I couldn't get it past my butt  for reference I normally wear a size M-L
Much too small for me. I ordered a small as a fairly petite person and the waistband was just much too tight. Not a fan of the fabric either.
Super cute. She grew out of them immediately
Just a bit on the small side. Had to give them to the 9 year old.

评论概述: Smaller than described & very thin material
评论详情: Smaller than described & very thin material

I ordered these for my daughter and niece for Christmas. They are probably half the size they should be, the size of a 2nd or 3rd grader. And I can't return them because in my haste to order for Christmas, I didn't realize they were coming from China and apparently it will cost a couple hundred dollars to ship them back. So, I own them now.
Don’t go by the picture, sizing for a little kid! And they smell so bad. Sending back.
These pants run very small. My daughter got an xl and they barely fit. The xl was more like a small. But they’re cute and comfy
These are comfortable but very thin which is great for summer but not as much in the winter.
This runs VERY small, and the fabric is awful and itchy.
I bought an xxl so it could be oversized and they were tight and they immediately started to wear away and have a big hole in them now and i have worn them TWICE!
I ordered XXL and they fit like Medium! Ugh!
I miss the size. My bad but it wonderful
It's so comfy and durable, very happy with it!
it was nothing i expected, it was like a child’s size… it’s not worth the money
The pants we ordered for a teenage girl size Large. They are so small they’d fit an 8 year old child. The fabric smells horribly of mold. Returned immediately!
Bought a xxl to be oversized and they were more like a medium. Don’t waste your money!
Way too small and definitely not for the tall girls and guys . And smelled for whatever reason
smelled weird when it first arrived and the figure of the pants is not what it showed in the pictures.
